alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Saginaw; Shiawassee; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Tuscola, southwestern Lapeer, southern Saginaw, eastern Shiawassee and Genesee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vassar to near Clio to Chesaning. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clio and Mount Morris around 505 PM EDT. Flushing, New Lothrop, Beecher and Crossroads Village around 510 PM EDT. Flint and Otter Lake around 515 PM EDT. Owosso and Otisville around 520 PM EDT. Columbiaville, Swartz Creek and Corunna around 525 PM EDT. Lennon around 530 PM EDT. Grand Blanc, Durand and Burton around 535 PM EDT. Davison and Bancroft around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Brant, Atlas, Rankin, Tuscola, Elba, Burt, Gera, Layton Corners, Richville and Genesee. People attending Bavarian Festival, and Frankenmuth Funtown Chowdown Food Truck Festival should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
